plot: Vicki and Briana drive cross country as Vicki finally gets her wish - her baby is moving back home. They encounter major bumps in the road, though, and the homecoming is not all that Vicki hoped. New housewife Kelly Dodd makes as nice as she can with the other ladies, while Meghan is struck out by hormones as she begins IVF. Heather struggles with her childrens' expectations about how much they see their father and shows up solo to a beach party Kelly throws to get to know all the women better. Vicki and Tamra pull their heads out of the sand to try and resolve the issues that have plagued them for the past year.—Zena Logan
